ComicInfo.Title: What?...You Haven't Tasted New Ipuna?; A Stirring Scene To Say The Least From MGMG's "Leave Me Or Leave"!; ...The Jack E. Glisten Story; Baseball... Science Or Skill?; MAD Awards...; The Stark Club; Fozless Fooznick; The Blackboard Jumble; Banish Body Aroma Problems and Like That; Your Voice of Wiseness Says Smoke Kennt; A Picture History of Ol' Craw
ComicInfo.Summary:
What?...You Haven't Tasted New Ipuna?: Phony ad for Ipuna Toothpaste.
A Stirring Scene To Say The Least From MGMG's "Leave Me Or Leave"!: Phony ad for movie "Leave Me Or Leave!"
...The Jack E. Glisten Story: A behind-the-scenes look at how the Jack E. Glisten show is produced.
Baseball... Science Or Skill?: Comparison of the scientific and instinctive methods of baseball team management: both fail.
MAD Awards...: Awards for best tv commercials.
The Stark Club: A tour through the nightly happenings at the Stark Club.
Fozless Fooznick: Fooznick is running from his relatives.
The Blackboard Jumble: Scenes from the movie and a recommendation for solving the real life violence problem in schools.
Banish Body Aroma Problems and Like That: Phony ad for NDDDS Chlorophyll Tablets.
Your Voice of Wiseness Says Smoke Kennt: Phony ad for Kennt Cigarettes.
A Picture History of Ol' Craw: Phony ad for Ol' Craw Whiskey.
